languages.text: "Прежде, чем мы продолжим... я хочу знать всю историю меча и Предела. От начала и до конца".
"Before we continue... I wish to know the story of the sword and the Edge. The whole story."
languages.original_text: "Прежде, чем мы продолжим... я хочу знать всю историю меча и Предела. От начала и до конца".

traits.locale_text: "Before we continue... I would like to know the story of the sword and the Edge. Entirely."
"Before we continue... I would like to know the story of the sword and the Edge. Entirely."
"Before we continue... I would like to know the story of the sword and the Edge. In its entirety."
"Before we continue... I would like to know the story of the sword and the Edge. In its entirety."
"Before we continue... I wish to know the story of the sword and the Edge. The whole story."

languages.text: “在我们继续前进之前……我想知道那把剑与破晓锋刃的故事，完整的故事。”
languages.original_text: "Before we continue... I wish to know the story of the sword and the Edge. The whole story."

traits.locale_text: “在我们继续前进之前……我想知道那把剑与破晓锋刃的故事，完整的故事。”

languages.text: « Avant de continuer... j'aimerais connaître l'histoire de l'épée et de la Lame, dans son intégralité. »
languages.original_text: "Before we continue... I wish to know the story of the sword and the Edge. The whole story."

traits.locale_text: « Avant de continuer... j'aimerais connaître l'histoire de l'épée et de la Lame, dans son intégralité. »

languages.text: 「続ける前に…剣と刃の話について教えてくれないか。その物語すべてを」
languages.original_text: "Before we continue... I wish to know the story of the sword and the Edge. The whole story."

traits.locale_text: 「続ける前に…剣と刃の話について教えてくれないか。その物語すべてを」

languages.text: «Antes de continuar... me gustaría conocer la historia de la espada y el Filo. Toda la historia».
languages.original_text: "Before we continue... I wish to know the story of the sword and the Edge. The whole story."

traits.locale_text: «Antes de continuar... me gustaría conocer la historia de la espada y el Filo. Toda la historia».

languages.text: "Ehe wir fortfahren ... Würde ich gerne die Geschichte des Schwerts und des Rands hören. Die ganze Geschichte."
languages.original_text: "Before we continue... I wish to know the story of the sword and the Edge. The whole story."

traits.locale_text: "Ehe wir fortfahren ... Würde ich gerne die Geschichte des Schwerts und des Rands hören. Die ganze Geschichte."
"Bevor wir fortfahren ... möchte ich gerne die Geschichte des Schwerts und des Rands erfahren. Die ganze."

languages.text: "Önce kılıcın ve Yalım'ın hikâyesini duymak istiyorum. Her şeyi ama."
languages.original_text: "Before we continue... I wish to know the story of the sword and the Edge. The whole story."
